channel.title: Commands.java Problem Wanted to Add ::master and ::bank
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a problem with a couple of commands
i wanted to add ::master for rights 3 and 2 and wanted to add ::bank for rights 4 3 2 1
anyone know where abouts i could add these im not sure where abouts to place the commands in the commands.java
Here is my commands.java http://pastebin.com/b82051jp

item.title: Commands.java Problem Wanted to Add ::master and ::bank
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

I need to see the errors specifically. Just seeing the commands themselves doesn’t help me much,

its cool i managed to fix with ya help cheers again next will be how to add ::crown 1 - 2 - 3 to change colours ;D gotta fix that private messaging tho

item.title: Commands.java Problem Wanted to Add ::master and ::bank
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You do not learn by me doing work for you. What are the errors you’re getting? Maybe I can walk you through them.

will this work bud?

                    if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.issDonator == 1 && !c.inWild() && !c.isInPbox() && !c.isInArd() && !c.isInFala() && !c.inFunPk()) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
					}
					if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.playerRights == 1 && !c.inWild() && !c.isInPbox() && !c.isInArd() && !c.isInFala() && !c.inFunPk()) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
					}
					if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.playerRights == 2 && !c.inWild() && !c.isInPbox() && !c.isInArd() && !c.isInFala() && !c.inFunPk()) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
					}
					if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.playerRights == 3 && !c.inWild() && !c.isInPbox() && !c.isInArd() && !c.isInFala() && !c.inFunPk()) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
					}
					if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.playerRights == 4 && !c.inWild() && !c.isInPbox() && !c.isInArd() && !c.isInFala() && !c.inFunPk()) {
			c.getPA().openUpBank();
					}

item.title: Commands.java Problem Wanted to Add ::master and ::bank
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:541607”][quote author=Your Commands file]
if (c.playerRights >= 0)
playerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 1 || c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
moderatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 2 || c.playerRights == 3)
administratorCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 3)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 5)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 10)
ownerCommands(c, playerCommand);
if (c.playerRights == 4)
DonatorCommands(c, playerCommand);
[/quote]
Add the commands to the appropriate methods in your Commands.java the text above was taken directly from your code off the pastebin link. Just search the appropriate method and add the command.[/quote]

thanks still seem to be getting errors tho would you be able to add this to the commands.java for me.

Read full topic

if (c.playerRights == 10)

if (c.playerRights == 4)
